encouragement.text: Every product that changes the world starts with a simple idea, every successful creator was once a beginner.
encouragement.callToAction: Don't let ideas stay in your mind, let's create the future together.

title.part1: What You Might Want to Know

faq.description: We've compiled the most frequently asked questions to help you better understand our community

what.question: What is a hackathon? Am I suitable to participate?
what.answer: A hackathon is an event where participants form teams to rapidly turn ideas into reality within a limited time (usually 1-3 days). Now there are many Vibe Coding hackathons that lower the technical barrier through AI programming tools (like Cursor, GitHub Copilot), allowing non-professional programmers to participate. Whether you're a developer, designer, product manager, or complete beginner, you can join!

nonTech.question: I don't have a technical background, can I join?
nonTech.answer: Absolutely! We need members with various backgrounds including designers, product managers, operations, marketing, etc. Many successful products are created by cross-disciplinary teams. The community has special guidance activities to help newcomers find partners.

mvp.question: What is MVP?
mvp.answer: MVP stands for Minimum Viable Product, referring to a functional prototype with minimal features that demonstrates core value. In our community, MVP is more of an action philosophy‚Äîcreating a useful product that solves real pain points within a week.

activities.question: What are the core activities of the community?
activities.answer: We have 3 core activities: 1) Demo Show Living Room Demo Session (monthly) - showcase 30% completed works for feedback; 2) Mini Hackathons (monthly) - rapid learning and creation around themes; 3) Weekend CoWork (every weekend) - offline collaboration and brainstorming.

collaborate.question: Can I find collaborators in the community?
collaborate.answer: This is one of the core values of our community! We encourage cross-disciplinary collaboration, and many members have found technical partners, designers, or product managers through the community.

fee.question: Is the community free?
fee.answer: The community itself is free to join! Basic activity participation, work sharing, and finding partners are completely free. We are a mission-driven social enterprise, with 100% of surplus reinvested in community public construction. We also incubate independent profitable projects, contributing to community development through profit feedback, forming a healthy business ecosystem.

moreQuestions.title: Have Other Questions?
moreQuestions.description: We're happy to answer more questions, or you can experience our activities first

warmCommunity.activitiesTransition: Let's see what exciting activities the community has prepared for you
warmCommunity.description: From half-day mini hackathons to monthly in-depth development, diverse activities meet different rhythms. MVP/early project friendly, even if you only have prototypes or demos, feel free to share boldly

home.description: Offline activities in cities like Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou, and Shenzhen + online events, from Demo Shows to hackathons, helping you turn ideas into reality in just one day
home.title: Rich Community Activities

joy.description: Relaxed and comfortable like chatting in a living room, gaining real user feedback and product inspiration through communication
joy.title: Creating Together, More Fun

partners.description: Independent developers, product managers, and tech enthusiasts gather together to find people who understand you and potential collaborators
partners.title: Meet Your Fellow Travelers

support.description: Whether it's prototypes, code, or demo videos, you can get sincere feedback. Growing together through encouragement and support
support.title: Early Project Friendly Environment

warmCommunity.subtitle: No matter which city you're in, you can join weekly community activities, collaborate with partners, and quickly turn ideas into reality
warmCommunity.title: Welcome Home, Creator
